definition: to welcome/to meet/to face/to forge ahead (esp. in the face of difficulties)
to line the streets in welcome

sentences.english: He came to welcome me with a handshake.
sentences.chinese: 他來與我握手錶示歡迎。

sentences.english: Russia, a major oil producer, is unlikely to embrace any ambitious emissions reductions.
sentences.chinese: 產油大國俄羅斯不太可能歡迎任何大幅減排計劃。

sentences.english: Strawberry, blackcurrant, litchi and mango are some popular flavoured yoghurt.
sentences.chinese: 草莓，黑醋栗，荔枝和芒果是一些受歡迎風味的酸奶。

sentences.english: Principal Fung Sui Hing giving the welcome speech.

sentences.chinese: 歡迎你們來到雲林機場。

sentences.english: Mercerization of cotton fabrics is still very popular.
sentences.chinese: 棉織物的絲光整理依然很受歡迎。

sentences.english: They also welcomed the decision to cancel the run-off election.
sentences.chinese: 他們也對阿富汗取消決選表示歡迎。

sentences.english: And the quality yet inexpensive consumer goods from China have been warmly received by the local people here.
sentences.chinese: 中國物美價廉的日用消費品，也深受當地人民的歡迎。
那些建議是否不受歡迎？

sentences.english: Kite-flying is very popular in China.
sentences.chinese: 放風箏在中國很受歡迎。

sentences.english: And welcome to the Curlicue Restaurant, how are you guys doing?
sentences.chinese: 歡迎來到花飾餐館，你們大家好嗎？

sentences.english: Aunt is ready for you to eat the teeth do not hurt the sugar, to taste, welcome to.
sentences.chinese: 阿姨準備了適合你喫不傷牙齒的糖，歡迎到時來嚐嚐。

sentences.english: Welcome to the Evangelical Formosan Church of Philadelphia resource link repository.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎來到費城臺服基督教會網路資源鏈接庫。

sentences.english: Among all the bridges, the most popular among tourists are the hanging bridges.
sentences.chinese: 在所有的橋中，最受旅遊者歡迎的就是繩索吊橋。

sentences.english: Welcome the various countries user to select " Bai Yue" the sign miniature bulb.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎世界各國用戶選用“白月”牌小燈泡。

sentences.english: Since that film scores a great success, its interlude songs are also much sought after.
sentences.chinese: 由於那部電影大獲成功，它的插曲也很受歡迎。

definition: to pay attention to/to follow sth closely/to follow (on social media)/concern/interest/attention
to like/to love/to be fond of/favorite
interest (desire to know about sth)/interest (thing in which one is interested)/hobby/CL:個|个[ge4]
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request
to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
(of an area) vast or extensive/large-scale/widespread/(of people) numerous
to study at the same school/fellow student/classmate/CL:位[wei4],個|个[ge4]
